item.title: Popping preconceived popover ponderings
item.content:encoded: I wrote much of this back in 2023 and 2024 while popover was still being implemented / was newly released. Since I began digitally scribbling my thoughts down, others ended up writing about the attribute - which was one of the reasons I didn’t feel any urgency in publishing my own post. Though, I did co-author one of Hidde de Vries’s articles about popover.

item.title: Use the dialog element (reasonably)
item.content:encoded: Today, the HTML specification landed a very important change to the dialog element. One that resolves a multi-year discussion on how the dialog element should handle initial focus.

item.title: Responsive accessibility using visibility hidden
item.content:encoded: Like it or not, even though content can be made to adapt to different viewport sizes and zoom levels by use of CSS media queries, sometimes the end result can be a bit awkward without further adjustments that go beyond visual presentation.
